item.title: Beauty Surrounds You
item.description:
Beauty Surrounds You

Level: All Levels When: October 1 - October 15, 2016 (14 days) Maximum Class Size: 6 Cost: 6599 Canadian Dollars (Includes tuition, shared accommodation, all meals, tips and gratuities, photography permits, entry and excursion fees, game drives, and transport, including airport shuttles) Deposit: 1450 Canadian Dollars Registration: To register, or for more information, please E-mail me, Christoph, at cgfischer@ho tmail.com Your Destination: Seemingly hidden at the end of the world, a vast, spectacularly beautiful coast line traces the southern most edge of the African continent.

item.title: Namibia Photography Tour | Beauty Surrounds You
item.description:
Namibia Photography Tour | Beauty Surrounds You

An all inclusive, two week long, dream photography tour of Namibia's most spectacular landscapes and wildlife destinations. A once in a lifetime opportunity
